name: Savory Breakfast Pinwheels
author: utes2010
summary: These easy delicious pinwheels are great for an appetizer or even dinner. I topped mine with a fried egg and avocado to make it a meal!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent roll dough (such as Pillsbury®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet or line with parchment paper
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crispy, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels and cut into bite-sized chunks
Spread crescent roll dough onto a work surface, being careful to keep it together as a single sheet of dough
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese evenly across the entire dough surface
Top with green onion, spinach, and bacon chunks
Roll up dough tightly into a log, starting at the short end of the rectangle
Place each slice cut side down on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until pinwheels are golden brown, 13 to 15 minutes
